head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: Manhattan: Woman Shot To Death

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: Manhattan: Woman Shot To Death

body.head.byline: By Dexter Filkins (NYT) (Compiled by Anthony Ramirez)

abstract.p: New York City police report that woman was killed and man shot and wounded in apartment in Washington Heights section of Manhattan (S)

block.p: A woman was killed and a man was shot and wounded yesterday in an apartment in Washington Heights, the police said. The police did not release the names of the victims, and they said they were not certain of the motive for the shootings. Neighbors said they heard a scream and several gunshots coming from the apartment, at 260 Fort Washington Avenue. The woman, 23, was shot in the head, and the man, 52, was shot in the buttocks. The police said the man was in serious but stable condition at Harlem Hospital Center.
